title.romaji: Dragon Ball: Majinjou no Nemuri Hime
title.english: Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
title.native: ドラゴンボール 魔神城のねむり姫

description:
Goku and Kuririn are given an assignment by Kame-Sen'nin: "Retrieve the sleeping princess from Lucifer and I will take you as my students." But the mission proves to be more perilous than originally thought.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Dragon Ball: Shen Long no Densetsu
Dragon Ball Z: Kyokugen Battle!! Sandai Super Saiyajin Special
